comments.body:
PostgresSQL throws `ERROR:  division by zero`: https://github.com/postgres/postgres/blob/REL_12_BETA1/src/test/regress/expected/case.out#L98-L99
I create SPARK-27923 to track this: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-27923

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +194,198 @@-- !query 20 schema
struct<CASE WHEN (1 = 0) THEN (CAST(1 AS DOUBLE) / CAST(0 AS DOUBLE)) WHEN (1 = 1) THEN CAST(1 AS DOUBLE) ELSE (CAST(2 AS DOUBLE) / CAST(0 AS DOUBLE)) END:double>
-- !query 20 output
1.0

comments.body: Your comment https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/24782/files#r289867687 should be moved to here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +199,203 @@
-- !query 21
SELECT CASE WHEN i > 100 THEN 1/0 ELSE 0 END FROM case_tbl
-- !query 21 schema
struct<CASE WHEN (i > 100) THEN (CAST(1 AS DOUBLE) / CAST(0 AS DOUBLE)) ELSE CAST(0 AS DOUBLE) END:double>
